thread.title: Cotton Bowl tunnel can be 'surreal' experience in Red River Showdown
thread.title_full: Cotton Bowl tunnel can be 'surreal' experience in Red River Showdown | Dallas Morning News

author: Chuck Carlton
title: Cotton Bowl tunnel can be 'surreal' experience in Red River Showdown
text:
One of the many things that make the Texas-Oklahoma rivalry unique is the crazy atmosphere in the Cotton Bowl tunnel, as Texas linebacker Tim Cole explained.
"It's surreal," Cole said. "It's different when you play at home because the crowd's for you. When you go to Texas-OU, it's split. So their fans are rowdy, our fans are rowdy, their players are rowdy, we're rowdy too, so we're just ready to go out there and compete."
